entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CompositionContainer is not thread safe - even when constructed as thread safe #59505
  • Update WiX package dependency #59498
    6.0.0
  • Duplicated activity baggage when calling SetBaggage on parent and current activity #59496
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: make not-generic JsonConverter constructor public #59493
  • Determine if/how to handle CultureInfo better in Regex (and RegexGenerator) #59492
    7.0.0
  • Determine if/how to handle default timeouts in RegexGenerator #59491
    7.0.0
  • ActiveIssue not skipped on CI for iOS/tvOS devices #59488
  • System.Text.Json: Guid from JsonElement not valid. #59474
  • Apphost defaults to wrong install location on multi-arch systems #59473
    6.0.0
  • Hot Reload in Blazor not working with Authorization-Middleware #59481
  • Intercept the Http Requests in asp.net MVC using c# #59472
  • [WASM][AOT] Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:2006, condition `<disabled>' not met #59471
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: bool HashSet<T>.Update(T value, out T actual) #59468
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Count / number of occurrences of a value in a span #59466
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging`'s `ILogger` should support providing a message in a function #59469
  • System.Text.Json source generator produces nullability warnings for NRT properties #59464
  • [API Proposal]: Add TrySelect #59463
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Math: IFixedPoint<TSelf> #59462
  • Unhandled Exception in Pipeline Execution Thread,Exception #59460
  • .net core 2.2 Internal error in the .NET Runtime at IP 00007FFEA84EB6B5 with exit code 80131506 #59458
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Tests.JsonElementWriteTests.WriteIncredibleDepth #59456
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests.TimestampRequestTests.BuildExpectedRequest_FromHashAndOid(viaSpan: True) #59455
  • [API Proposal]: Custom attribute for Pre-compile AOP #59454
  • RyuJIT: reconsider arm32 callfinally code pattern #59453
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException(server: wss://corefx-net-http11.azurewebsites.net/WebSocket/EchoWebSocket.ashx) #59451
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic in reflection JSON serializer to match src-gen #59450
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\regressions\\Dev11\\154243\\dynamicmethodliveness\\dynamicmethodliveness.cmd #59449
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #59448
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/Sse2/Sse2_ro/Sse2_ro.sh #59447
    7.0.0
  • superpmi: support Linux arm/arm64 benchmarks collection #59446
    7.0.0
  • superpmi: create asm diffs AzDO pipeline #59445
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.SpanTests.FillNativeBytes #59444
  • Move SuperPMI replay pipeline to "public" #59443
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Parsing CSV (TextFieldParser) from ZipArchive fails with .net 6 RC1. #59371
    6.0.0
  • TextFieldParser does not correctly handle input from streams that don't fill out the full array provided. #58857
    7.0.0
  • ArPow stage 2: implementing source-build CI #54573
    6.0.0
  • Every minor version of .NET 5 exist at the same time #57629
  • Upgrade net461 tfms to net462 for NET7 #57842
    7.0.0
  • Upgrade netcoreapp3.1 and net5.0 to net6.0 for NET7 #57844
    7.0.0
  • DacDbiInterfaceImpl::IsModuleMapped returns S_FALSE without setting *isModuleMapped #59393
    7.0.0
  • Rosetta x64 translation fools arch detection in installers #59370
    6.0.0
  • [JsonConstructor] should not be required on readonly structs with a single parameterized constructor #59309
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [RegexGenerator(...)] attribute #58880
    7.0.0
  • Http client certificate authorization Issue in .NET 5 in Docker #59435
  • Jit should inline CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_REF (at least for hot paths) #59031
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests are disabled in WASM #59228
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Append _FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 to CMAKE_REQUIRED_DEFINITIONS #59504
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Run Catalyst ARM64 tests on macOS 12, just to see what happens #59502
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst, os-macos-monterey (macOS12)
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [workloads] Use the dual signed wix version for workload msis #59501
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [workloads] Use the dual signed wix version for workload msis #59500
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move Type equality operators to shared CoreLib partition #59499
    area-System.Reflection
  • Issue 59415 #59497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused emitter call types and improve INS_tail_i_jmp handling #59495
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Fixes, and improvements based on user feedback #59486
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59484
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59480
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run wasm aot, wbt tests on windows #59479
    area-Build-mono
  • [docs] macOS: add note about Xcode command line tools #59477
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • Refactoring XmlWriterSettings #59467
    area-System.Xml
  • [release/6.0] Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59452
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add a note about rerunning the license/cla check #59440
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Fix buffering bugs in TextFieldParser #59487
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Split install_location to file-per-architecture #59485
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.0
  • Update xunit version on release branch #59277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update FileStatus field names in HostModel tests #59482
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Mark time trigger #58261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [main] [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59490
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Set *isMapped to false to satisfy 'out' semantics #59430
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integrate changes from NativeAOT branch #59478
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Split install_location to file-per-architecture #59404
    area-Host, 6.0.0
  • Set install_location arch specific #59441
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59422
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix gtCloneExpr when cloning during R2R compilation a GT_ALLOCOBJ node #59438
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Fix concurrent access to cache. #59423
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete Type.GetTypeHandleInternal #59459
    area-System.Reflection
  • Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Cleanup reflection RuntimeType checks #59457
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix concurrent access to cache. #59412
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix brick table issue due to race condition in adjust_limit_clr #59411
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu #58987
  • CI matrix change: drop OSX 10.13 #59084
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • We should not call distribute_free_regions at the end of background GC #59413
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests #59396
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json, disabled-test
  • Add notes about not calling src-gen APIs directly and make them non-browsable #59385
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update xunit version on dotnet/runtime #59275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Port DllImportGenerator to dotnet/runtime #59363
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix buffering bugs in TextFieldParser #59506
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [release/5.0] Update to latest .NET 5 SDK #59428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • XmlSerializer support for IsDynamicCodeSupported=false #59386
    area-Serialization
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Update area owners to include new owners of S.DS.* #59357
    area-Meta
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move clang-format download into dotnet/runtime and add docs for setting up auto-formatting in the repository #59374
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Fix incorrect handling of character range and capitalization … #59425
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • File preallocationSize: align Windows and Unix behavior. #59338
    area-System.IO
  • Refactoring XmlReaderSettings #59409
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    community-contribution
  • Setup retry for System.Net.* tests #57370
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Improve ReliabilityFramework #59384
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    arch-wasm
